levels.title: Pumpkin Olympics
levels.description: The industrial world has been really busy since your last encounter, and they are starting to gather round this pumpkin patch. Well unfortunately for them, this patch is Dave's pride and joy and is bound to win the pumpkin Olympics. You'll just have to use these athletes to your advantage to fight off the growing horde.
levels.author: @desephalopod

levels.title: The Worst Zombie Pool
levels.description: You know when you play Plants vs. Zombies 2 and that one weasel killed you, or Octo Zombie can't stop launching his children at you... well, all of those idiots came in one level.

levels.title: Assault Airspace
levels.description: This is a vast endless sky. Clouds there are filled with dangerous lightning. Zombies are driving all kinds of dangerous weapons. You will meet an unprecedented challenge. Watch out or you will be gunned down!

levels.description: Penny: "Dave, the horde is approaching with zombie cows, sheep, bulls, chickens, and a Giga Gargantuar Crazy Dave: "Yikes Whatâs going on, Penny? Penny: "It appears they're celebrating a holiday called Sacrifice Showdown. Crazy Dave: "Zombies having a holiday? Thatâs CRAAAZY Let's crash their party It's Aid-el Adha, and what better way to celebrate than to slaughter some pesky zombies!

levels.title: Welcome to the Gimmick Garden
levels.description: Experience 36 weird and wacky levels with gimmicks that will definitely test your skills and challenge your brain! Fight invisible zombies with columns of plants, defend a column of split peas from threats on both sides, ash zombies only with fire tiles, and more!
levels.author: Cathy Nekonin

levels.title: Green Gold Rush Survival
levels.description: The survival version of green gold rush, this level is a expansion of the epic quest green gold rush.
levels.author: Smart zombie

levels.title: Enter the Emerald Extravaganza
levels.description: Experience 10 levels set in the exciting Emerald Extravaganza, a circus filled with all kinds of weird and wacky showcases! Pelt performers with peas to appease the audience, show off the unmatched power of flowers while protecting a flower line, witness magic from both plants and zombies alike, and perform toe-to-toe with the legendary Luan Jester!
levels.author: Cathy Nekonin

levels.title: The Alter. Remix of the Neon Mixtape Tour, Side B!
levels.description:
Flashback! Rewind once again to the 80's and enjoy the dazzling new crossovers of these energetic Zombies!

Honorable Mentions to @N.I.F.A.U.  and @Bandy (the Spanish translator)  for all their support during the creation of the pack, thanks a lot to both of them!
levels.author: @fazbearfuntime_91713

levels.title: Sandbox Arena (Easy Edition)
levels.description:
Tired of Torchlights melting your hordes? Or Mecha Football pushing your nuts? Well, now you can test your strategies without worrying, because here there is ONLY Basics, Imps, and Gargs, as well as their variants.
Not only that, but there are a LOT of variants. EVERY variant to be exact. Have fun!
levels.author: UltLoser
